nl.weeaboo.vn.scene

Interface IAxisAlignedContainer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IDestructible, IInputHandler, IPositionable, ISignalHandler, IVisualElement, IVisualGroup, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ILayer, IViewport

    public interface IAxisAlignedContainer
extends IVisualGroup, IPositionable
    Layout group which transforms its children with an x/y offset, but no rotation.
